metadata.title: CVE-2024-26772 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ext4:avoid allocating blocks from corrupted group in ext4_mb_find_by_goal()Places the logic for checking if the group's block bitmap is corrupt underthe protection of the group lock to avoid allocating blocks from the groupwith a corrupted block bitmap.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
